attributes.action: Go to war on the front line with our troops at times of war
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Life is precious and no life is worth more than another, if the leader of this country (regardless of age) wishes to send other human beings to fight in a war he MUST fight beside them, there are enough members of the cabnet to ensure the running of the country in the event of his/her death

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
